Definition: when many different customers share access to the same physical resource pool in a cloud environment
cloud-focused exploitation framework, i.e. metasploit for the cloud
AWS cloud security configuration testing tool
Cloud Access Security Broker - software tools that serve as intermediaries between cloud service users and cloud service providers
Physically or logically reside inbetween the network path of the user and service provider. Allows the CASB to see requests and block them if they violate policy
Do not interaact directly with the user but interact with the cloud provider through their API; does not require a hardware or logical middleman but does not allow policy enforcement
